description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This game supports English, French, Italian, German, and Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". In LEGO® Batman™ : The Videogame, play as Batman and his sidekick Robin as you build, drive, swing and fight your way through Gotham City. Then, jump into the story from the other side and play as Batman’s foes! There is no rest for the good (or the evil)! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: In LEGO® Batman™ : The Videogame, play as Batman and his sidekick Robin as you build, drive, swing and fight your way through Gotham City. Then, jump into the story from the other side and play as Batman’s foes! There is no rest for the good (or the evil)!

media.title: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
media.edition: Platinum Hits, Bundled with Xbox 360, Bundle Copy (2 Games)
